EntityTemplate.Description: A scaly human with the ability to breathe underwater
Like a swamp ogre, but it kills you.
A beagle-sized beetle. Powerful mandibles protrude from its head. Not aggressive, but social.
A common waterbird identified in flight by its distinctive "V"-shaped flock formation.
A mammal known for their ability to spray a liquid with a strong unpleasant smell.
Air-breathing arthropods that have eight legs and jaws with fangs able to inject venom.
A crustacean with a poor disposition.
Out of the sewer and into the wasteland.
A horse is a horse of course of course.
